data.name: Chronicles of cyberpunk - Deep sleep
data.detailed_description:
Chronicles of cyberpunk - Deep sleep - continuation of the exciting story about the confrontation between Big Brother and the Supercomputer. You wake up in the first section of the Great Wall - a legendary place that many do not believe in its very existence. You are part of a large experiment that could change the world, but you don’t remember it. It is necessary to escape, but how to do it, being in an invisible fortress that cannot be felt?



  • game is a linear interactive story-driven adventure;
  • explore the world;
  • interact with many unusual characters and watch their fate as you progress through the story;
  • run ancient mechanisms.

Play the first part of the series for free:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/742470/Chronicles_of_cyberpunk/

data.short_description: Chronicles of cyberpunk - Deep sleep - is an exciting story about the confrontation between Big Brother and Supercomputer in unusual world

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.3GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 260GTX, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
